description:
Hyuuga Mitsukuni is the founder of Hyuuga Corporation. He`s spent his entire life working to achieve its current economic success. He was strict in raising Koutarou, training him in leadership since he was a boy and grooming him as his successor, and finally appointing him as Project Leader for the new powered suits he`s bet his company`s future on.
Source: official site
name: Hyuuga Mitsukuni
